title: Ielle:  A Realm of Janos Novel
description: Although she has prepared for it for years, Ielle finds herself thrust into the world of the Hausa of Janos. Kyr is one of the most powerful men on her world and he has chosen her for his owned property. They must learn to build their life together while ferreting out the assassin that lives in their midst.An erotic otherworldly tale of dominant males and the submissives they own. This is not the typical BDSM story, rather, it is an explicit romance of lust and passion found at the feet of the master.Publisher's This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable. It is intended for an adult audience.(approximately 210 pages, 47,000 words)
author: Andre SanThomas
